description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Experience the puzzling Minesweeper game with a new modern look. Up to 4 players competitive or CO-OP. Highly customizable games complete with highscores and user statistics.
